org.jvirtanen.nassau.moldudp64

Class MoldUDP64DefaultMessageStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jvirtanen.nassau.moldudp64.MoldUDP64DefaultMessageStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoldUDP64MessageStore

    public class MoldUDP64DefaultMessageStore
extends Object
implements MoldUDP64MessageStore
    The default implementation of a MoldUDP64 message store.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE
      The default block size is 64 MiB.
      static int MIN_BLOCK_SIZE
      The minimum block size is 4 KiB.

      • get

        public int get(ByteBuffer buffer,
               long sequenceNumber,
               int requestedMessageCount)
        Description copied from interface: MoldUDP64MessageStore
        Retrieve zero or more messages. Start with the specified sequence number and a message count of zero. Repeat the following algorithm until it terminates:
        1. Check the current message count. If it is equal to the requested message count, terminate the algorithm.
        2. Find the message with the current sequence number. If the message is not found, terminate the algorithm.
        3. Check the buffer. If the buffer has fewer bytes remaining than are required by a two-byte message header and the message, terminate the algorithm.
        4. Put a message header into the buffer. The message header consists of one field: the message length encoded as an unsigned 16-bit big endian integer.
        5. Put the message to the buffer.
        6. Increment the message count.
        7. Increment the sequence number.

        Return the message count.

        Specified by:
        get in interface MoldUDP64MessageStore
        Parameters:
        buffer - a buffer
        sequenceNumber - the sequence number
        requestedMessageCount - the requested message count
        Returns:
        the message count
